instructions:
FILLING
4 eggs, slightly beaten
1 1/2 cups light Karo syrup
1/2 cup plus 2 tbsp dark brown sugar
3 tbsp melted margarine
1 1/2 tsp vanilla
2 1/2 cups pecans, chopped

Mix flour, granulated sugar and salt in mixer bowl. Then, with mixer on medium, cut in the margarine
until it resembles coarse crumbs. Grease bottom and sides of a 15 x 10 x 1 inch baking pan. Press dough
evenly into pan. Bake for 20 minutes in a 350 F oven.
While crust bakes prepare the filling. In a large bowl, stir eggs, Karo, brown sugar, melted margarine and
vanilla till well blended. Stir in pecans.
Pour filling over baked crust and spread evenly. Bake again in a 350 F oven for 25 minutes. Cool pan on
a wire rack and cut into bars.
name: Pecan Pie Bars
creator: Carol Decker
